main_text.sentence: KA/KS values were reconstructed for individual branches of the evolutionary tree derived from the Darwin bioinformatics workbench (see Methods) using a distance matrix and ancestral states constructed by the method of Messier and Stewart [39].
Many databases constructed on the GenoList data schema were subsequently constructed (, [11]).

It is well established to divide Religiosity into three sub-constructs: Intrinsic, Extrinsic, and Quest Religiosity [17-20], while the construct Spirituality was divided into the following sub-constructs: Cognitive Orientation Towards Spirituality, Experiential/Phenomenological Dimension of Spirituality, Existential Well-Being, Paranormal Beliefs, and Religiousness [21].

WT1-A SAOS cells were constructed from a cell line harboring the tetracycline-repressor-VP16 fusion protein [43], transfecting the parental cell with a construct harboring WT1 isoform A (-17amino acids, -KTS) linked 3' to the CMV minimal promoter and tetracycline operators [44].
Heterokaryons were constructed as described in [20].

In a different study, inclusions of NoV ORF3 and poly(A) sequences in a construct increased the expression levels of NoV rVP1 and the stability of VLPs when compared to constructs without these sequences [6].
MLV and LVs were constructed as described previously [19,20].
BP trees were constructed using the software MrBayes v3.0B4 [45,46].
